solution_line_template: First find the area of the painting: {painting_length} feet * {painting_width} feet = <<{painting_length}*{painting_width}={painting_area}>>{painting_area} square feet
Then find the area of the wall: {wall_length} feet * {wall_width} feet = <<{wall_length}*{wall_width}={wall_area}>>{wall_area} square feet

Then divide the area of the painting by the area of the wall and multiply by {percentage_multiplier}% to express the answer as a percentage: {painting_area} square feet / {wall_area} square feet * {percentage_multiplier}% = {percentage_taken_up}%
